test.name: Verificar se a página inicial é acessível

kw.name: Start Video Recording
kw.doc: Starts the recording of a video in the background with the specified ``name``. The recording can be stopped by calling the `Stop Video Recording` keyword.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Acessar a página home do site
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Link
kw.doc: Verifies link identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//caption' contains exact text 'Lista de Tarefas'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Stop Video Recording
kw.doc: Stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias`` and generates the file in WebM format. If no ``alias`` is specified, the last opened recording will be closed. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be closed. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the video will be displayed in the log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Start Video Recording
kw.doc: Starts the recording of a video in the background with the specified ``name``. The recording can be stopped by calling the `Stop Video Recording` keyword.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Acessar a página home do site
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Link
kw.doc: Verifies link identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//caption' contains exact text 'Lista de Tarefas'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Digitar "Estudar automatização de testes" na caixa "Nova tarefa..."
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Estudar automatização de testes' into text field '//input[@placeholder="Nova tarefa..."]'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar se a nova tarefa está visível
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Table Row Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that table row contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Stop Video Recording
kw.doc: Stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias`` and generates the file in WebM format. If no ``alias`` is specified, the last opened recording will be closed. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be closed. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the video will be displayed in the log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Verificar se a mensagem de erro "Tarefa inválida" aparece
kw.sourcename: Verificar se a mensagem de erro "${MsgError}" aparece

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//small/strong[contains(.,"Tarefa inválida")]' contains exact text 'Tarefa inválida'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Stop Video Recording
kw.doc: Stops the video recording corresponding to the given ``alias`` and generates the file in WebM format. If no ``alias`` is specified, the last opened recording will be closed. If there are more recordings with the same alias all of them will be closed. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the video will be displayed in the log file.
